items.sentence: When we were young, we never got along too well, did we?
Why is it important to be at the meeting this afternoon?
Just because he\'s wise doesn\'t mean that he\'s honest.
I can\'t believe you don\'t want butter on your popcorn.
I wonder if Tom\'s parents will allow him to go with us.
I wonder why Tom didn\'t want to go to Boston with Mary.
I can almost guarantee that Tom won\'t get here on time.
I can\'t think of a reason not to go to the beach today.
Tom has always been more interested in science than art.
Tom has been waiting for us for the past thirty minutes.
